mapper.select: select aai_seq,aai_id,aai_role from admin_account_info where aai_id= #{id} and aai_pwd = #{pwd}
select ceil(count(*)/10) from admin_account_info where aai_id like '%${keyword}%'

select rd_seq,rd_rpi_seq,rd_id,rd_name,rd_phone,rd_gen,rd_role,rd_status,rd_nickname,rd_reg_dt,rd_mod_dt,rd_profile from reader_info where rd_id like '%${keyword}%' order by rd_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(*)/10) from reader_info where rd_id like '%${keyword}%'
select count(*) from reader_info where rd_id like '%${keyword}%'

select a.*,b.bi_seq ,b.bi_title,c.bc_img_file,d.rd_id from book_reply a inner join book_info b on a.bre_bi_seq = b.bi_seq left outer join ( select * from book_cover_info where bc_is_poster= 1 )c on b.bi_seq = c.bc_bi_seq inner join reader_info d on a.bre_rd_seq = d.rd_seq where bre_rd_seq = #{seq}
select rd_seq,rd_id ,rd_status from reader_info where rd_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_account_info (aai_id, aai_pwd, aai_role) VALUES (#{aai_id}, #{aai_pwd}, #{aai_role})
INSERT INTO reader_status_edit (rse_rd_seq, rse_reason, rse_reg_dt) VALUES (#{rse_rd_seq}, #{rse_reason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
